reviewText: On the plus side there is some very good music, both pop and seasonal. And it is fun to see some of the outfits which passed for fashion back then. On the other hand, there are some incredibly unfunny comedians featured on these two programs. If you're willing to take it with a grain of salt it is an groovy way to spend Christmas, I suppose.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought these for my wife because she is a big fan, she liked most of the two episodes, but I don't think she fell in love with them.  The guy can sing and he had Ella on one of the shows with him so that was great.
Title: N/A

reviewText: How can you go wrong with the winning combination of Tom Jones's vocals covering your favorite Christmas songs?  Not to mention getting to see him doing it live on his very own television show with some popular vocalists of that time period.  Wonderful gift for the Tom Jones fan any day of the year, but especially nice to find underneath your Christmas tree.  It will certainly put you into the spirit of the season!

reviewText: Looked forward to getting this  DVD,lol I paid more than its current listed price and I just got it from AMAZON yesterday,The transfer is good, but there is not enough TOM!  He is so talented and so great to watch!  A must for any fan!
